TopicTitle: Who are you fav KSP youtubers?

Articles.Content:
I love watching kerbal space program videos on youtube. my favourite ksp youtubers are Scott Manley and Kurtjmac

who are you favourite ksp youtubers?
Agreed, manly and Jmac are the best.

Kurtjmac makes far to few videos to be on of the best KSP youtubers and i don't really understand why he is in the Special thanks.

I like TheWinterOwl, Scott Manley, Pleborian and HOCgaming.
I like Dannys videos because they make me laugh.

I watch Scott Manley, HOCgaming (cant believe hes 14). I used to watch Kurtjmac, but he seems to have stopped playing KSP now and is just minecrafting, which is a shame, as i like his KSP vids.

I will be looking into Pleborian and Thewinterowl thanks to Canopus.

I will be looking into Pleborian and Thewinterowl thanks to Canopus.
Both are great! And TheWinterOwl is one of the best spaceplane builders under the KSP Youtubers.

Kurtjmac makes far to few videos to be on of the best KSP youtubers and i don't really understand why he is in the Special thanks.

Maybe it`s in some way connected to the dozens upon dozens of fantastic videos he has already made, and been making for the last year and a half.

otherwise

Scott for the soothing melodic voice, and moderate carnage

Macey for story driven cinematics, with things I could never put together

Danny for the laughs.. and extensive carnage.

Chickenkeeper24, for teaching me to play the game
@soranno Fantastic Videos? I mean they are good but not better than the other Guys.
I enjoy the videos of Scott Manley, kurtjmac, and Danny2462. I wish Markiplier had made more KSP videos, but I think once he reached the Mun that was about the peak of his career.
Scott manley, winter owl, macey dean, danny,and enter elysium.

I tried watching TheWinterOwl but his goofy goggling drove me batty , oh look my insane plane just blew up killing all the Kerbils ... hyuck hyuck hyuck, I like to pick up trick and tips while watching but I am already a master of killing Kerbils with insane designs.

Scott Manly was good, but has fallen off the scale lately ... I loved watching his Re-usable Space Program and watching him put **** together, but he seems to have wandered off to other pastures.

Kurt I am still watching his series, while its old its nice as a roadmap tour of KSP's development. The excitement of EVA, his joy at 'landing legs', the confusion of all those parts (stock only but compared to the older versions there was a lot added suddenly).

Robbaz is my fav.

I don't think I should call him "KSP youtuber" since he does videos of other games too but anyway...

@soranno Fantastic Videos? I mean they are good but not better than the other Guys.

Yes, fantastic videos.

Kurt`s videos being fantastic does not impact upon others` videos being good or otherwise, who are all perfectly capable of creating fantastic videos of their own.

Yes, fantastic videos.

Kurt`s videos being fantastic does not impact upon others` videos being good or otherwise, who are all perfectly capable of creating fantastic videos of their own.

Of course not but i would say his videos are average.
The only KSPers I watch are Scott Manley, Macey Dean, and Danny2462.
Can't stand Manley's voice, even though his videos are great. Chickenkeeper24 is my go-to since he plays mainly stock.
It might have something to do with kerbals spamming his Farlands or Bust Series demanding more Kerbal Space Program. Just saying...
My favourite has to be Pleborian. Then it is Scott Manely, then Robbaz.

Me. Because I'm starting to make new videos again. Yay.

https://www.youtube.com/user/drjonez
His name is escaping me at the moment, but the lad who went to Dres and lost a Kerbinaut called Lulas - that guy does pretty solid work.

Can't stand Manley's voice, even though his videos are great. Chickenkeeper24 is my go-to since he plays mainly stock.

I think his voice is what makes him so fun to listen to. I'd love to have an Scottish accent.

Pleborian and PurpleTargets.

Edited July 1, 2013 by AustralianFries

Scott Manley,

Hands down the best front man for KSP vids. His voice is clear, he has a professional disposition, mild humor and does his homework with facts and data. He holds your interest to the very end.

My favorite ksp youtuber is...well me. lol.

but no really, scott manely and danny. they were my instpriation for doing videos/livestreams.
